task.summary:
Change projectile behaviour
Also tweak commands

Add basic air combat
- Air attacks cost 75 stamina and CANNOT be used with out it. - Throwing projectiles in air cost 3 ammo (SOON) - Stamina now regenerates faster

Add 3 new features/fixes
- Very simple (and bad) footstep sfx - Difficulty implemented - Player running animation speed changes based on movespeed (so does footstep sfx)
